trustfund:
TF033235-GEORGIA - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT,TF032957-EASTERN EUROPE
            (ARMENIA,GEORGIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF032956-EASTERN EUROPE
            (ARMENIA,GEORGIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF032955-EASTERN EUROPE
            (ARMENIA,GEORGIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF032954-EASTERN EUROPE
            (GEORGIA,ARMENIA) - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT,TF022072-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT,TF029337-PHRD - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the Structural
            Adjustment Credit Project is to consolidate stabilization,
            foster a strong and sustained growth recovery and reduce
            poverty.  The Government's reform program, supported by
            the project, aims at: 1) maintaining a tight monetary
            program supported by an improving fiscal position; 2)
            streamlining the Government sector and improving efficiency
            of public spending; and 3) inducing a rapid adjustment of
            the productive sector to new market signals.  Other
            objectives of the project are to: 1) provide budgetary
            support to maintain the level of critical public
            expenditures; 2) provide foreign exchange for the purchase
            of critical imports; and 3) provide a framework for
            financial assistance from other donor agencies.  The key
            reforms that the project will finance are: 1) removal of tax
            exemptions and strengthening of tax administration; 2)
            improvements in collection of energy payments; 3) changes in
            the provision and financing of social services; 4)
            restructuring of the pension system and social protection;
            5) acceleration of privatization; 6) restructuring of the
            financial sector; and 7) trade liberalization and trade promotion.
